deputies.query: SELECT deputy_id, state, email, party AS political_party, photo_url FROM read_csv_auto('{csv_file_path}', delim=',', header=True)

expenses.query:
SELECT \
            deputy_id, \
            valorDocumento AS document_amount, \
            dataDocumento::DATE AS document_date, \
            tipoDespesa AS expense_type, \
            cnpjCpfFornecedor AS supplier_cnpj, \
            nomeFornecedor AS supplier_name, \
            parcela AS installment, \
            tipoDocumento AS document_type, \
            mes AS month, \
            ano AS year \
            FROM read_csv_auto('{csv_file_path}', delim=',', header=True, (strict_mode=false))
